Author: medooza
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Let me explain my point of view: Every project who want ro success, must connect with its customers on the basis of BLOCKCHAIN principles - freedom. An ETHEREUM-based project can easily write a smart contract and allow its customers to receive the TOKEN at any ERC20 address. I think it is fair to let the customer hold the TOKEN as he wants, even if he is not worth anything at the moment. After all, we paid for that TOKEN. Why 95% of the projects do not allow you to control ....? Something to think thought about .... For example, the MEDOOZA project is the proof otherwise possible: - You are allowed to hold MEDOOZA it wherever you want. - You can realize it at any point you want in their store. - You can move the token to whom you want whenever you want.  * This is not say anything negative about Agate .  This is only my opinion.

Author: inv3stor
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: AGATE Partners with World #1 POS for Dry Cleaning and Clothing industry will allow over 2000 merchants to accept Cryptocurrencies globally   Today is another historic and fruitful day for Agate as we are one step closer in making crypto adoption in everyday life a reality and making crypto as a method of payment for everyone. We are very excited to announce that today Agate signed a strategic partnership with Geelus Point of Sale (POS). This agreement will enable over 2000 merchants to accept cryptocurrency globally without the price volatility risk of cryptocurrency. Geelus is the worldâ€™s number 1 POS SaaS system for dry cleaning, laundry, clothing alterations and tailors. Geelus is the complete cloud-based point-of-sales and store management software which can be used on any Internet connected device ranging from PCs and Macs to iPhones and smart TVs. It also includes CRM and Marketing functions like email and SMS marketing.     Full Story: https://medium.com/agatechain/agate-partners-with-world-1-pos-for-dry-cleaning-and-clothing-industry-will-allow-over-2000-759ca23425c9 https://twitter.com/AgateChain/status/1070621462032089088

Author: Kuksi
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: You can read about it in WP or even on Agate website, but I will lay it out here for you anyway.  iFiats exist on Agate blockchain rather than on less developed and tested blockchains, also, not within closed-source software running on centralised, private databases, or on very costly and slow blockchains like bitcoin, which is not viable or practical to use it as a medium to transfer funds or for micropayments.  Although, iFiats can be used just like other cryptocurrencies, i.e., in a p2p, pseudo anonymous, decentralised, cryptographically secure environment, but they are only circulated inside Agate blockchain to facilitate the payments and real-time settlement and secure the value of funds for both users and merchant as iFiat redemption will not face any pricing or liquidity constraints.  iFiats run on one of the fastest decentralised blockchain platforms, which include a decentralised exchange (DEX), Browser base, wallet encryption, open source, multiparty security and reporting functions and all transaction can be tracked on our blockchain explorer.  iFiatâ€™s one-to-one backing implementation is easier for traditional merchants to understand and accept for their goods or services. Although iFiats are fully redeemable via the options below, the best use case scenario is to spend it with other merchants or suppliers, because itâ€™s real-time and has a very small transaction fee for users.  Instant loading onto virtual or physical debit cards  Request to transfer to bank account  Pay any type of bill, include loan repayment, utilities etc.  Generate crypto gift voucher, which is redeemable with all Agate merchants (in store or online)

Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: iFIAT Ecosystem was created to better handle the volatility of cryptocurrencies which is especially important is you are merchan, that way you know you will always get the proper value for your product despite the volatility of cryptocurrencies that you accept as a payment for your merchandise.

Author: Londondungeon
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: iFIAT is one of the most interesting elements of Agate. It uses decentralised blockchain technology (Agate blockchain) to resolve many of the fundamental issues in the cryptoeconomy in real time.  Fiat-pegged cryptocurrency works like a fiat credit or stable coin and is called â€œiFiat.â€ All iFiat will initially be issued on Agate blockchain, so they exist as a cryptocurrency token. Each iFiat unit issued into circulation is backed on a one-to-one ratio (i.e., one iFiat iUSD is one US dollar) by the corresponding fiat currency unit.  This has a lot of advantages over other fiat-pegged cryptocurrencies.

Author: yuvadeep
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: A state of white-label solutions helps developers to build their own DApp or DAO on a strong and dependable infrastructure. Therefore, other cryptocurrencies have high transaction and exchange fees. Mining is very expensive that uses a Proof of Work. All the merchants are accepting cryptocurrency that helps in comparing the total number of traditional merchants with a very low price. Agate compares all the features of the crypto-economy that are substituted in 12 modules. However, the ecosystem works on the Agate, where blockchain transactions are far cheaper and faster. Agate blockchain is an actively involved with Proof of Stake (PoS) mining shows the lowest effect on the environment. Agate combines all the in-store merchants or e-commerce websites and introduces a new blockchain technology that helps to perform transactions faster which can be processed in few minutes. Users have a chance to manage up to 17 different coins and tokens from blockchain in Agate's with multi-currency wallet app. By allowing transactions in the form of cash, merchants guarantee that can be transferred to fiat money in each and every day that they can use for their business.

Author: Klackalica
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: iFiat Ecosystem uses decentralised blockchain technology (Agate blockchain) to resolve many of the fundamental issues in the cryptoeconomy, which will facilitate transactions very economically and in real-time.  The blockchain also has its own objects; more details have been described in its section. Fiat-pegged cryptocurrency works like a fiat credit or stable coin and is called â€œiFiat.â€ All iFiat will initially be issued on Agate blockchain, so they exist as a cryptocurrency token. Each iFiat unit issued into circulation is backed on a one-to-one ratio (i.e., one iFiat iUSD is one US dollar) by the corresponding fiat currency unit.  Agate iFiat has a lot of advantages over other fiat-pegged cryptocurrencies.

Author: Inmytree
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Well it can't be non-technical  Here is a list of advantages, if you don't understand something ask and someone will surely explain it to you.  Although, iFiats can be used just like other cryptocurrencies, i.e., in a p2p, pseudo anonymous, decentralised, cryptographically secure environment, but they are only circulated inside Agate blockchain to facilitate the payments and real-time settlement and secure the value of funds for both users and merchant as iFiat redemption will not face any pricing or liquidity constraints.  iFiats run on one of the fastest decentralised blockchain platforms, which include a decentralised exchange (DEX), Browser base, wallet encryption, open source, multiparty security and reporting functions and all transaction can be tracked on our blockchain explorer.  iFiatâ€™s one-to-one backing implementation is easier for traditional merchants to understand and accept for their goods or services. Although iFiats are fully redeemable via the options below, the best use case scenario is to spend it with other merchants or suppliers, because itâ€™s real-time and has a very small transaction fee for users.  Instant loading onto virtual or physical debit cards  Request to transfer to bank account  Pay any type of bill, include loan repayment, utilities etc.  Generate crypto gift voucher, which is redeemable with all Agate merchants (in store or online)

Author: inv3stor
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: 1) Has Agate got any VC funding or is it 100% crowd funded? Yes two crypto fund backed Agate so far,(one is us base)  2) Are there any partnerships with non-crypto companies, banks etc. as this is a finance based company? Yes , in particular there is a contract with a passive card issuer and another one with a financial institution to settle fiat fund in user's bank account  3- Why go for another blockchain instead of say develop a sidechain on ETH itself. Developing a new blockchain significantly raises the entry barriers and slows down adoption? initially some of the module has been built on Etherium blockchain where transaction is not instant and it's so costly for micropayements, then built on Waves Platform where due to limited number of coin, transaction cost get expensive  as Waves coin increased in value ($16 in Dec 2017) and finally they decided to run their own chain with instant transaction and almost free transaction cost to allign with project goal and to mainstream crypto payments.  4) What's the basis of saying, "Labelled as PAYPAL OF CRYPTOCURRENCY BY +100,000 strong community members". Is the product already launched and used by 100,000 members? we aim to get 100k user soon , but to answer your question we've most of crypto community after reading our white paper or check the product consider Agate as PayPal for crypto currency  there is also an article regarding  this https://youmeandbtc.com/news/the-agate-blockchain-is-like-paypal-for-cryptocurrencies/   I hope I answered your question, but please let me know if you have any other question.

Author: Blueoyster
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Agate iFiat has the following advantages over other fiat-pegged cryptocurrencies.  iFiats exist on Agate blockchain rather than on less developed and tested blockchains, also, not within closed-source software running on centralised, private databases, or on very costly and slow blockchains like bitcoin, which is not viable or practical to use it as a medium to transfer funds or for micropayments.  Although, iFiats can be used just like other cryptocurrencies, i.e., in a p2p, pseudo anonymous, decentralised, cryptographically secure environment, but they are only circulated inside Agate blockchain to facilitate the payments and real-time settlement and secure the value of funds for both users and merchant as iFiat redemption will not face any pricing or liquidity constraints.  iFiats run on one of the fastest decentralised blockchain platforms, which include a decentralised exchange (DEX), Browser base, wallet encryption, open source, multiparty security and reporting functions and all transaction can be tracked on our blockchain explorer.  iFiatâ€™s one-to-one backing implementation is easier for traditional merchants to understand and accept for their goods or services.  Although iFiats are fully redeemable via the options below, the best use case scenario is to spend it with other merchants or suppliers, because itâ€™s real-time and has a very small transaction fee for users.  Instant loading onto virtual or physical debit cards  Request to transfer to bank account  Pay any type of bill, include loan repayment, utilities etc.  Generate crypto gift voucher, which is redeemable with all Agate merchants (in store or online)

Author: Fulanaw
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: ICO Analysis: Agate Published on August 17, 2018 By Joshua Larson Proof: https://hacked.com/ico-analysis-agate/  Team Based in Sydney, Australia, the site list 16 team members including tthree founders.     Hamed Taghvaei-   A serial founder of tech companies, including Drone Online, Myservo, King ICO and Business and Demand Group PTY LTD.     Hamid Ostad â€“  Impressive resume. Since 2016, heâ€™s been the Solutions Architect at BPay Group, a successful Australian bill payment company. He has seven years of experience as tech lead at Creative Digital Technology and five years Dev Manager at Gpayments PTY.     Ali Dorri â€“ PhD candidate at UNSW studying blockchain. He seems to be a blockchain tech expert. No work history listed; his description says heâ€™s worked with several successful blockchain projects already. A few of the team members stand out. Ehsan Jahandarpour â€“ CMO. An influencer, he was ranked top 20 growth hacker in 2016 Forbes. Ariya Chittasy â€“ The website says heâ€™s helped produce four startups over the last eight years, and twi of them are successful. Currently at  Engenesis Ventures, where he â€œis working with visionaries and innovators to create tech-based companies that serve the world â€ Odette Abrenica â€“ UI/UX Designer. She also has the same role at Engenesis. Jaemie Dela Pena â€“ Product Design Lead for Agate and Engenesis. Asi Asgher â€“ Project lead, also works at Engenesis. There are six advisors â€“ they look decent. J Brenton Smith was the VP & GM Asia Pacific & Japan business of Dell Software Group.  Verdict Thereâ€™s plenty to love about the project including a few unique, possibly groundbreaking ideas. However, there is also plenty of risk. Debit cards for one. Countless blockchain projects have come out with their ICOs talking about how they will have a debit card which can be spent with different cryptos all around the world, yet all of them have flopped so far.  Risks     Their Telegram channel is for announcements only. Itâ€™s going to be hard to grow a community around the token if they canâ€™t talk to each other easily. Also seems kind of shady to not allow possible contributors the ability to ask questions in real time. -1     The founders of Agate also recently founded an ICO launching business called King ICO. And most of the team is from a company called Engenesis which is a blockchain project incubator. This means thereâ€™s a possibility this team is not serious about making Agate, and are more into making millions of dollars doing ICOs. -1     Laws/Regulations. Itâ€™s going to be really hard to get the proper banking licenses required to fully run the Agate platform world wide. -2  Growth Potential     According to the roadmap. Q1 of 2019 is when they will be hoping to get their proper banking licenses. +1     The community seems to like this project, although some of the enthusiasm can be chalked up to their bounty/airdrop program. A large majority of ICO review websites give this project a 90+, or A ranking. And the Bitcointalk page is filled with enthusiastic supporters.+2     If this succeeds, the sky will be the limit. +1     Teams tokens will be locked up for 1 year. +1     50,000 AGT must be staked in the future to run a POS node. +2     GitHub is active and there are several beta demos of diff aspects of the platform. +1.5     Several backers. +2  Disposition High risk/ high reward. If they build everything they talk about in the whitepaper, and then get the proper banking licenses, this could moon. +6.5/10

Author: inv3stor
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: I need to give you some background to understand there are different types POS staking, in Agate there are 490m coin in total, imaging these coins are spread between different stake holders on network some one have 1 coin some 1000, some 50k and some 50 mil , if there is no transaction on the network no one will receive any reward, but if one user does one trans action which then he need to pay 0.01 AGT as gas (this 0.01 AGT proportionally will distribute  between thos ones which either ran their own full node or leased their coin to some one who has a full node, ) currently test net running on 5 full node but when we switch to mainnet it will start with 26 server in different locations plus everyone can also run their own full node. I hope I answered your question.

(40% of total funds) and we are lucky that our CMO Mr, Ehsan Jahandarpour one of the Forbes Top 20 Growth Hacker who hugely help us to promote our project in a very short time and to define a comprehensive GTM strategy and mass adoption, in particular targeting 3 markets, Merchants , Payment processors and in the last stage Businesses  which are looking to tokenise their crypto economy,   there are several programs and campaign has been designed to  insensitives merchants, for example providing Free POS terminal and marketing materials for the 1st year and extend this period if they attract certain number of users as per turnover, and many more strategy which will take alot of time to describe, not to mention we already made few agreements with franchisors  for mass adoption for their branched in Australia and alos one accredited payment processor in Canada for same, I don't need to emphasize more that a business can be successful with a strong product, team and strategy behind it and we believe Agate is one of them.

Author: HulioIglesias
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Here is a bit more info about POS Terminals.  Unlike traditional POS terminal solutions, which are limited to a specific region, Agate POS terminals can be used everywhere in the world without infrastructure limitation! These terminals use the Internet to securely connect to our POS server hosted in the cloud on five continents, and users can use mobile Internet (i.e., 3G/4G) or any other type of common Internet connection (e.g., LAN, WiFi, ADSL) in order to connect their devices to our network.  While currently merchants have to pay between 0.5% and 3% transaction fees to their banks, financial institute or POS providers, as Agate POS terminal sits on Agate iFiat Ecosystem, which run in Agate blockchain, merchants wonâ€™t pay anything when they receive the funds in their iBucket wallet. As iBucket is a decentralised wallet, they can spend it anywhere they likeâ€”for example, to pay their suppliers or buy items for themselvesâ€”or, alternatively, they can request to deposit it to their bank accounts or to load onto their debit cards.

Body: am very much researching this Merchant Space.  Watching the big boys, watching the newbies, and there will be some major upside for whoever gets mass adoption.  I like what you are doing here but one concern is the capital.  It may take some serious money to make it and get registered to do business in some of the biggest markets like USA, Europe, etc.    (We are talking millions of USD to do business in the States for example)  Also, it will take massive and I mean massive amount of money to actually handle merchant processing.  Maybe in excess of 50 Million USD?  To handle the float between exchanges, provide liquidity to merchant/consumers, etc.

Author: descuri
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: "POS benefits  Saves energy With the POS, the attacker would need to have a stake of 51% of the cryptocurrency to carry out a 51% attack. The POS avoids this tragedy as it makes it disadvantageous for a miner with a 51% stake to attack the network. No one would like to strike a system where they hold a majority stake. In case of a fall in the value, their stake would also fall. Therefore, the stakeholder will always try to maintain the high-security levels In a POS, the validators are those who own the coins. Hence, you have the loyalty aspect, working for you."  its is definitely easier to use this type of protocol, and you don't have to mine and there are some loyalty benefits.

Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: The product of this project is so complex. If can not practically complete. Surely there will need preparation and great work to make it happen. In my opinion, there are 2 products with features that interesting and very useful if it works well and according to plan.  First - Payment gateway. For the payment gateway, I think it's enough many of which existed before. But the cryptocurrency payment gateway which easily integrate with traditional online stores, are rare. Things that still stumble over the Market fluctuation problem, many cases and impractical of cryptocurrency characteristics.  Second - Physical POS Terminal. Agate POS designs with very flexible rules for user's convenience. The existing POS network system previously - FIAT, has many rules for users due to cost building and caring is expensive. While Agate POS has different features i.e No lock-in contract, no exit fee and no penalty for return the POS terminal whenever.  So overall, this project is very good, but must be very careful because many others are failing with the same concept. thereby, i hope next tokens sale will be more attractive and get every opportunity for success.

Author: masterCookie
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: This is what their website says:  Lack of comprehensive solutions that can support all aspects of a true cryptoeconomy. Shortage of white label solutions to allow developers to build their own DApp or DAO on a strong, reliable infrastructure. Highly volatile crypto market. Slow speed and high transaction fee and exchange rate. Expensive and environment unfriendly mining method Proof of Work (PoW). The number of merchants accepting cryptocurrency in comparison to the total number of traditional merchants is very low. User-Facing Problems Lose the value of usersâ€™ crypto assets in poor exchange markets. Slow transaction speeds, taking from a few minutes to days to settle a transaction. Managing several different coins and tokens that need different wallets. Merchant-Facing Problems Merchants are unsure which currencies to accept. Business suppliers may not use cryptocurrency. Slow transaction settlements; many providers take days to pay the merchants.

Author: Londondungeon
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: iFiat Ecosystem One of the most interesting elements of Agate is the Agate iFiat Ecosystem. It uses decentralised blockchain technology (Agate blockchain) to resolve many of the fundamental issues in the cryptoeconomy, which will facilitate transactions very economically and in real-time.  The blockchain also has its own objects; more details have been described in its section. Fiat-pegged cryptocurrency works like a fiat credit or stable coin and is called â€œiFiat.â€ All iFiat will initially be issued on Agate blockchain, so they exist as a cryptocurrency token. Each iFiat unit issued into circulation is backed on a one-to-one ratio (i.e., one iFiat iUSD is one US dollar) by the corresponding fiat currency unit.  Agate iFiat has the following advantages over other fiat-pegged cryptocurrencies.  iFiats exist on Agate blockchain rather than on less developed and tested blockchains, also, not within closed-source software running on centralised, private databases, or on very costly and slow blockchains like bitcoin, which is not viable or practical to use it as a medium to transfer funds or for micropayments.  Agate iFiat Ecosystem is capable of supporting many different iFiats; however, it currently runs on iUSD, which is pegged by USD, and each token always represents $1 USD. In later versions, we plan to add EUR, GPB, JPY and AUD.

Author: Inmytree
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Hopefully this will shed some light on it for you:  Fiats exist on Agate blockchain rather than on less developed and tested blockchains, also, not within closed-source software running on centralised, private databases, or on very costly and slow blockchains like bitcoin, which is not viable or practical to use it as a medium to transfer funds or for micropayments.  Although, iFiats can be used just like other cryptocurrencies, i.e., in a p2p, pseudo anonymous, decentralised, cryptographically secure environment, but they are only circulated inside Agate blockchain to facilitate the payments and real-time settlement and secure the value of funds for both users and merchant as iFiat redemption will not face any pricing or liquidity constraints. iFiats run on one of the fastest decentralised blockchain platforms, which include a decentralised exchange (DEX), Browser base, wallet encryption, open source, multiparty security and reporting functions and all transaction can be tracked on our blockchain explorer. iFiatâ€™s one-to-one backing implementation is easier for traditional merchants to understand and accept for their goods or services. Although iFiats are fully redeemable via the options below, the best use case scenario is to spend it with other merchants or suppliers, because itâ€™s real-time and has a very small transaction fee for users. Instant loading onto virtual or physical debit cards Request to transfer to bank account Pay any type of bill, include loan repayment, utilities etc. Generate crypto gift voucher, which is redeemable with all Agate merchants (in store or online)

While letting anyone develop their own business models on the platform, using Agate API Suite, also provides the most reliable platform for merchants who do not want to risk crypto market fluctuations. That the only way to solve these problems, unlike in the traditional crypto economy, is a multipronged approach; users need more optimal ways to spend their money, merchants need easier ways to accept funds, and developers and businesses need a comprehensive protocol to develop their own App, DAO, and so on. i believe this project will success in the future

I like what you are doing here but one concern is the capital.  It may take some serious money to make it and get registered to do business in some of the biggest markets like USA, Europe, etc.    (We are talking millions of USD to do business in the States for example)  Also, it will take massive and I mean massive amount of money to actually handle merchant processing.  Maybe in excess of 50 Million USD?  To handle the float between exchanges, provide liquidity to merchant/consumers, etc.

Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: These 2 in combination will be a significant game changer.  II.   0% transaction fee  While currently merchants have to pay between 0.5% and 3% transaction fees  to their bank, financial institute or POS providers, Agateâ€™s POS terminal sits on Agate iFiatâ€™s Ecosystem, which runs Agate blockchain. This means merchants will not be charged when they receive the funds in their iBucket wallet, and as iBucket is a decentralised wallet, they can spend it anywhere they likeâ€”for example, to pay their suppliers or buy items for themselvesâ€”or, alternatively, they can request to deposit it to their bank accounts or to load onto their debit cards.  III.   Instant settlement (24 x 7 x 365)  In legacy POS terminal systems, banks or service providers usually limit their merchants to only perform settlements once or twice in a day . Even after 24 hours of this settlement, they may not access their funds for various reasonsâ€”for example, if the merchantâ€™s business bank account is different than the POS provider or if they settle after the bankâ€™s deadline (usually 10:00 p.m.) or over the weekend. Running transactions on Agate iFiat Ecosystem resolves these issues with real-time settlement, because as soon as a customer pays the funds become available and spendable in the merchantâ€™s wallet.  Allowing much more flexibility and opening a lot of options for a merchant!

Author: inv3stor
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: here is bounty >> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4426676  Regarding Physical POS terminal which comes in a desktop and a handheld (for smaller shops) I would suggest to have a look to white paper for more details but here some highlights for your reference Currently the Agate POS terminal is available in two types, for mobile users and for physical stores, which both come with unique features, including but not limited to the following:  I.   Borderless  Unlike traditional POS terminal solutions, which are limited to a specific region, Agate POS terminals can be used everywhere in the world without infrastructure limitation! These terminals use the Internet to securely connect to our POS server hosted in the cloud on five continents, and users can use mobile Internet (i.e., 3G/4G) or any other type of common Internet connection (e.g., LAN, WiFi, ADSL) in order to connect their devices to our network.  II.   0% transaction fee  While currently merchants have to pay between 0.5% and 3% transaction fees  to their bank, financial institute or POS providers, Agateâ€™s POS terminal sits on Agate iFiatâ€™s Ecosystem, which runs Agate blockchain. This means merchants will not be charged when they receive the funds in their iBucket wallet, and as iBucket is a decentralised wallet, they can spend it anywhere they likeâ€”for example, to pay their suppliers or buy items for themselvesâ€”or, alternatively, they can request to deposit it to their bank accounts or to load onto their debit cards.  III.   Instant settlement (24 x 7 x 365)  In legacy POS terminal systems, banks or service providers usually limit their merchants to only perform settlements once or twice in a day . Even after 24 hours of this settlement, they may not access their funds for various reasonsâ€”for example, if the merchantâ€™s business bank account is different than the POS provider or if they settle after the bankâ€™s deadline (usually 10:00 p.m.) or over the weekend. Running transactions on Agate iFiat Ecosystem resolves these issues with real-time settlement, because as soon as a customer pays the funds become available and spendable in the merchantâ€™s wallet.  IV.   Secure connection  This is a decentralised ecosystem, and because there is no middleman to handle transactions, all transactions are performed on the Agate iFiat Ecosystem blockchain with unique and traceable TX ID, which is trackable in Agate block explorer. For other connections (commands, user data, etc.) from a POS terminal to our cloud hosting, we have used a secure method that included hashing all data with a public key and a nonce; then the hashed payload and nonce would be sent to the cloud, and a server would decrypt it by using a private key while the whole process runs on SSL context with valid CA certificate, which is a symmetric 256-bit encryption on  X.509 certificates .   V.   No lock-in contract, no exit fee  In order to encourage merchants to use Agate POS terminals and, as a result, to grow the Agate POS network, there wonâ€™t be any lock-in contracts. They will only need to pay a one-off fee in AGT token to have this service, as shown in the table below, plus a small monthly fee in AGT token for maintaining this infrastructure. Also, merchants can return the terminal as soon as they like without penalty.  VI.   No monthly fee (optional)  Merchants have the choice to own POS terminals by paying a one-off fee to avoid recurring monthly fees; to do so, they can pay from their iBucket wallets or with AGT token.  VII.   NFC/RFID support  In-store terminals (desktop) can support NFC payments, so instead of showing QR codes, users can use NFC to pay (similar to Visa PayWave  or Mastercard PayPass ).  VIII.   Selling virtual goods  In order to incentivise merchants to use the Agate POS terminal, they can also sell virtual goods (e.g., phone charge, iTunes, Google play, Skype credit and similar items) directly on the POS and get commissions for them. As all these transactions would happen on the iFiat Ecosystem using Agate API Suite, these items can be provided by any supplier who is willing to sell their services to Agate users. However, this option is planned for after the ICO. When the Agate merchant app is updated, this feature would immediately be available on all merchant POS without extra hardware or cost.  IX.   Never lose a dollar!  In legacy POS terminals, if for any reason a terminal is damaged either physically, through faults in their applications or because of electronic shock, itâ€™s quite possible that merchants may lose their whole dayâ€™s income if they do not settle on time. In the Agate POS terminal, this is prevented because of its decentralised nature; as soon as users pay, the Agate POS terminal will sign into the iFiat Ecosystem and, as all the funds are logged in Agate blockchain, the merchant can access it from any other device and spend it or cash it out.

Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Token Details are available in agate website however I mention it here  Total AGT Token Supply (100%): 490,000,000 AGT Total AGT Token Supply For Sale (65%): 318,500,000 AGT Offered Token Exchange Rate: 1AGT~$0.076USD Minimum Contribution: $60 USD ~ 0.1 ETH Maximum Contribution:  $60,000 USD ~ 100 ETH (except accredited investors and strategic partners) Soft Cap/Hard Cap: 2,000,000 USD/24,206,000 USD Token Name: AGT Token Protocol: ERC20, Etheruem Blockchain Lock Up Period: All team members tokens will be locked for one year period on smart contract and vesting quarterly. Unsold Token: Burn by smart contract Emission Rate: NO new coins will be minted, created or mined after crowd-sale

Author: inv3stor
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Yes of course it will give more options to  both users and merchants to transfer their crypto to different currencies but the main difference are       1- to eliminate exchange rate for major currencies when user's want's to cash-out to card to bank account.         2- to make native debit card currency as per user's preference.      3- to let users to diversifying their iFiat portfolio between different currencies in order to mitigate pair currencies volatility risk as well (although normally is not as high as crypto but still exist >> https://xe.com/currencycharts/?from=USD&to=EUR&view=10Y ).

Author: inv3stor
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Sorry but it's Agate not Agile Agate utility token it the fuel for Agate blockchain platform with over 10 direct and unlimited in-direct utilisation as below   1.   All exchange orders between different cryptocurrencies have a fixed cost of 1.00 AGT  2.   Any trades by Agate Trade Bot at the time of execution would cost 1.00 AGT  3.   Although exchanging cryptocurrency to any iFiat token is free, if users want to load their cards or request bank transfers, Agate will charge them equivalent of 1% of the transferred order in AGT token.  Code: Example: Tim wants to transfer $500 worth of BTC to his card. He exchanged 1 BTC on the best exchange rate (1 BTC = 10,000 iUSD), and his iBucket would charge iUSD 500 (no additional exchange or transfer fee) in the next step; he wants to load $500 to his card then.  As 1 AGT = $0.094 and 1% of $500 is $5, he needs 53.19148936 AGT to authorise this order; so letâ€™s say the value of AGT token increases by 10X, and each token is worth $0.94; to do so, he needs 5.3191489AGT to do the same, so itâ€™s always better to buy and keep more AGT token to save more on AgateChain fees.  4.   In order to bootstrap the Agate iFiat ecosystem while there is no transaction fee to buy any item inside Agate iFiat Ecosystem, for example, customers can go to any Agate Merchant, either in store or online, and pay 100 iUSD to buy some things, and merchants will receive the exact 100 iUSD, which they can use to pay to their suppliers who also are in this ecosystem, or they may prefer to cash out their funds to their cards or to bank accounts. This is when we charge them the equivalent of 1% of a withdrawal fee in AGT token (like when users load their cards).  5.   Ordering cards, POS terminals, printing paper rolls or any physical merchantâ€™s accessories can be paid by AGT tokens; this would immediately add value to the tokens.  6.   Agate Token Generator, as described in its section, allows everyone to create their own customised tokens; to do this they should pay a one-off fee of 50 AGT. This can be done through Agate Token Generator GUI or Agate API Suite.   7.   Any transaction, either inside iFiat Ecosystem or when businesses or developers create their own tokens, should pay by AGT coin (like gas in Ethereum).  8.   Once we switch to Agateâ€™s main net from our existing test net, all AGT coins would be minable, and as we use the Proof-of-Stake(PoS) method in our blockchain, and miners needs to buy a minimum of 50,000 AGT coin or create a public mining pool in order to start mining, this also would highly increase the demand for AGT coin.  9.   Once our smart contract implementation is finished, in order to execute it in Agate, blockchain users need to pay in AGT coin.  10.   B2B income, by having a comprehensive API suite, the whole suite can be used as white-label platform for those, first, who have their own customers and want to avoid banking fees (e.g., big supermarkets or petrol station chains) or companies who have their own customer acquisition methods and go to market strategy or enterprises who want to integrate AgateChain with their existing environment and application or even ERP. While they can generate their own iFiat tokens to make sure there is no other token issuer, all operations inside AgateChain would work only with AGT token, and also they should buy a API call package for each request as in the pricing table below plus 50 AGT tokens for initial account setup fee, which we will waive for the first 50 companies to roll the ball!

Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Unlike POW (proof of work) where you need to use expensive hardware and processor's power and obviously electricity for consensus mechanism, in POS (Proof of stake) everyone can hold coin in their wallet or run a node to be a part of mining (consensus mechanism), AGATE use POS and everyone can participate on it, below image will give you a better view of who it works. for more information refer to Agate whitepaper or read this external article :  https://hackernoon.com/consensus-mechanisms-explained-pow-vs-pos-89951c66ae10

Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Please check this  3.1.5 (b) Cryptocurrencies: (i) Wallets: Apps may facilitate virtual currency storage, provided they are offered by developers enrolled as an organization. (ii) Mining: Apps may not mine for cryptocurrencies unless the processing is performed off device (e.g. cloud-based mining). (iii) Exchanges: Apps may facilitate transactions or transmissions of cryptocurrency on an approved exchange, provided they are offered by the exchange itself. (iv) Initial Coin Offerings: Apps facilitating Initial Coin Offerings (â€œICOsâ€), cryptocurrency futures trading, and other crypto-securities or quasi-securities trading must come from established banks, securities firms, futures commission merchants (â€œFCMâ€), or other approved financial institutions and must comply with all applicable law. (v) Cryptocurrency apps may not offer currency for completing tasks, such as downloading other apps, encouraging other users to download, posting to social networks, etc.   source: https://developer.apple.com/app-store/review/guidelines/

Author: Pental
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Currently there are 10 direct utilisation for Agate and in-direct potential  in enormous because as an platform or blockchain protocol thousands of developers and business can use Agate to generate their own tokens and run their very own crypto economy on Agate, here I copied 10 direct utilisation from WP:  ------ Unlike most newly generated tokens of ICOs in blockchain apps or software with no or only one income stream, one of the value propositions of the AGT token is that it has several revenue streams to ensure our token holders have a solid, continuous value-added token. While we always work to add as many as possible new strong income streams for AGT token, here are some examples for the current Agate token:  1.   All exchange orders between different cryptocurrencies have a fixed cost of 1.00 AGT 2.   Any trades by Agate Trade Bot at the time of execution would cost 1.00 AGT 3.   Although exchanging cryptocurrency to any iFiat token is free, if users want to load their cards or request bank transfers, Agate will charge them an equivalent of 1% of the transferred order in AGT token.   Code:  Example: Tim wants to transfer $500 worth of BTC to his card. He exchanged 1 BTC on the best exchange rate (1 BTC = 10,000 iUSD), and his iBucket would charge iUSD 500 (no additional exchange or transfer fee) in the next step; he wants to load $500 to his card. As 1 AGT ~ $0.079 and 1% of $500 is $5, he needs 63.291139 AGT to authorise this order; so letâ€™s say the value of AGT token increases by 10X, and each token is worth $0.79; to do so, he needs 6.329113 AGT to do the same, so itâ€™s always better to buy and keep more AGT token to save more on Agate fees.   4.   In order to bootstrap the Agate iFiat ecosystem while there is no transaction fee to buy any item inside Agate iFiat Ecosystem, for example, customers can go to any Agate Merchant, either in store or online, and pay 100 iUSD to buy some things, and merchants will receive the exact 100 iUSD, which they can use to pay to their suppliers who are also in this ecosystem, or they may prefer to cash out their funds to their cards or bank accounts. This is when we charge them the equivalent of 1% of a withdrawal fee in AGT token (similar to when users load their cards). 5.   Ordering cards, POS terminals, printing paper rolls or any physical merchantâ€™s accessories can be paid by AGT tokens; this would immediately add value to the tokens. 6.   Agate Token Generator, as described in its section, allows everyone to create their own customised tokens. To do this, they should pay a one-off fee of 50 AGT. This can be done through Agate Token Generator GUI or Agate API Suite.  7.   Any transaction, either inside iFiat Ecosystem or when businesses or developers create their own tokens, should be paid by AGT coin (like gas in Ethereum) which is 0.01 AGT.  8.   Once we switch to Agateâ€™s main net from our existing test net, all AGT coins would be minable, and as we use the Proof-of-Stake (PoS) method in our blockchain, and miners needs to buy a minimum of 50,000 AGT coins or create a public mining pool in order to start mining, this also would highly increase the demand for AGT coin.  9.   Once our smart contract implementation is finished, in order to execute it in Agate, blockchain users need to pay in AGT coin.  10.   B2B income, by having a comprehensive API suite, the whole suite can be used as white-label platform for those, first, who have their own customers and want to avoid banking fees (e.g., big supermarkets or petrol station chains) or companies who have their own customer acquisition methods and go to market strategy or enterprises who want to integrate Agate with their existing environment and application or even ERP. While they can generate their own iFiat tokens to make sure there is no other token issuer, all operations inside Agate blockchain would work only with AGT token, and also they should buy a API call package for each request as in the pricing table below plus 50 AGT tokens for initial account setup fee, which we will waive for the first 50 companies to get the ball rolling!

Body: It's a legit question, lots of people don't know what they do, I didn't know either So wikipedia helps  Growth hacking is a process of rapid experimentation across marketing funnel, product development, sales segments, and other areas of the business to identify the most efficient ways to grow a business. A growth hacking team is made up of marketers, developers, engineers and product managers that specifically focus on building and engaging the user base of a business.  Growth hackers often focus on low-cost alternatives to traditional marketing, e.g. using social media, viral marketing or targeted advertising[2] instead of buying advertising through more traditional media such as radio, newspaper, and television.

Author: Pental
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Let's have a brief comparison just in merchant solutions:  PayPal  Provides online payment solutions to its users. It enables its users to transact money through their account balances, bank accounts, credit cards. Make an online payment, receive money or set up a merchant account.  Agate  1) Agate currently accepts five most important cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Ripple and Litecoin, and we plan to increase the total number of coins to over 17, making it the choice to transact via the Agate platform an easy one. Merchants would receive the exact dollar value every time. 2) By allowing transactions back to cash, merchants are assured that they can transfer to fiat money quickly for everyday use in their business. 3) In the Agate iFiat Ecosystem, all funds are immediately available and spendable for merchant.  So we needed to use something similar like PayPal (NOT EXACTLY) to introduce the Agate project.

Author: inv3stor
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: it's not that clear what are their criteria in particular but mining + any app  with crypto wallet + ICO + Exchange.  here is full refrence   https://developer.apple.com/app-store/review/guidelines/#goods-and-services  2.4.2 Design your app to use power efficiently. Apps should not rapidly drain battery, generate excessive heat, or put unnecessary strain on device resources. Apps, including any third party advertisements displayed within them, may not run unrelated background processes, such as cryptocurrency mining.   3.1.5 (b) Cryptocurrencies: (i) Wallets: Apps may facilitate virtual currency storage, provided they are offered by developers enrolled as an organization. (ii) Mining: Apps may not mine for cryptocurrencies unless the processing is performed off device (e.g. cloud-based mining). (iii) Exchanges: Apps may facilitate transactions or transmissions of cryptocurrency on an approved exchange, provided they are offered by the exchange itself. (iv) Initial Coin Offerings: Apps facilitating Initial Coin Offerings (â€œICOsâ€), cryptocurrency futures trading, and other crypto-securities or quasi-securities trading must come from established banks, securities firms, futures commission merchants (â€œFCMâ€), or other approved financial institutions and must comply with all applicable law. (v) Cryptocurrency apps may not offer currency for completing tasks, such as downloading other apps, encouraging other users to download, posting to social networks, etc.

Author: inv3stor
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Currently there are 10 direct utilisation for Agate and in-direct potential  in enormous because as an platform or blockchain protocol thousands of developers and business can use Agate to generate their own tokens and run their very own crypto economy on Agate, here I copied 10 direct utilisation from WP:  ------ Unlike most newly generated tokens of ICOs in blockchain apps or software with no or only one income stream, one of the value propositions of the AGT token is that it has several revenue streams to ensure our token holders have a solid, continuous value-added token. While we always work to add as many as possible new strong income streams for AGT token, here are some examples for the current Agate token:  1.   All exchange orders between different cryptocurrencies have a fixed cost of 1.00 AGT 2.   Any trades by Agate Trade Bot at the time of execution would cost 1.00 AGT 3.   Although exchanging cryptocurrency to any iFiat token is free, if users want to load their cards or request bank transfers, Agate will charge them an equivalent of 1% of the transferred order in AGT token.   Code: Example: Tim wants to transfer $500 worth of BTC to his card. He exchanged 1 BTC on the best exchange rate (1 BTC = 10,000 iUSD), and his iBucket would charge iUSD 500 (no additional exchange or transfer fee) in the next step; he wants to load $500 to his card. As 1 AGT ~ $0.079 and 1% of $500 is $5, he needs 63.291139 AGT to authorise this order; so letâ€™s say the value of AGT token increases by 10X, and each token is worth $0.79; to do so, he needs 6.329113 AGT to do the same, so itâ€™s always better to buy and keep more AGT token to save more on Agate fees.  4.   In order to bootstrap the Agate iFiat ecosystem while there is no transaction fee to buy any item inside Agate iFiat Ecosystem, for example, customers can go to any Agate Merchant, either in store or online, and pay 100 iUSD to buy some things, and merchants will receive the exact 100 iUSD, which they can use to pay to their suppliers who are also in this ecosystem, or they may prefer to cash out their funds to their cards or bank accounts. This is when we charge them the equivalent of 1% of a withdrawal fee in AGT token (similar to when users load their cards). 5.   Ordering cards, POS terminals, printing paper rolls or any physical merchantâ€™s accessories can be paid by AGT tokens; this would immediately add value to the tokens. 6.   Agate Token Generator, as described in its section, allows everyone to create their own customised tokens. To do this, they should pay a one-off fee of 50 AGT. This can be done through Agate Token Generator GUI or Agate API Suite.  7.   Any transaction, either inside iFiat Ecosystem or when businesses or developers create their own tokens, should be paid by AGT coin (like gas in Ethereum) which is 0.01 AGT.  8.   Once we switch to Agateâ€™s main net from our existing test net, all AGT coins would be minable, and as we use the Proof-of-Stake (PoS) method in our blockchain, and miners needs to buy a minimum of 50,000 AGT coins or create a public mining pool in order to start mining, this also would highly increase the demand for AGT coin.  9.   Once our smart contract implementation is finished, in order to execute it in Agate, blockchain users need to pay in AGT coin.  10.   B2B income, by having a comprehensive API suite, the whole suite can be used as white-label platform for those, first, who have their own customers and want to avoid banking fees (e.g., big supermarkets or petrol station chains) or companies who have their own customer acquisition methods and go to market strategy or enterprises who want to integrate Agate with their existing environment and application or even ERP. While they can generate their own iFiat tokens to make sure there is no other token issuer, all operations inside Agate blockchain would work only with AGT token, and also they should buy a API call package for each request as in the pricing table below plus 50 AGT tokens for initial account setup fee, which we will waive for the first 50 companies to get the ball rolling!

Know your customer (alternatively know your client or â€˜KYCâ€™) is the process of a business identifying and verifying the identity of its clients. The term is also used to refer to the bank and anti-money laundering AML regulations which governs these activities. Know your customer processes are also employed by companies of all sizes for the purpose of ensuring their proposed agents, consultants, or distributors are anti-bribery compliant. Banks, insurers and export creditors are increasingly demanding that customers provide detailed anti-corruption due diligence information.

Author: inv3stor
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: We developed both User and Merchant Apps for both Android and IOS platform however as you might know due to new Apple policy they won't any blockchain project/ICO app to be release on App store hence our strategy is to keep developing IOS as well and once we switch to main-net and got all approval speak with Apple to officially release our APP.

Author: inv3stor
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Thanks for asking this great question as Merchant are the most important part of Agate stakeholders (in business side). there are several reasons which merchants love Agate include but not limited to:  1- There is no complication for them to accept crypto currency, they don't need to know anything about blockchain, wallet, exchange ,... they simply using either App or physical POS terminal and can request to transfer in their bank account or Debit card seamlessly  2- the biggest problem for  merchant is volatility, if they see something and accept any crypto and tomorrow , next week or next month they wanna pay for rent, staff, bills, supplier ,.... there is no guarantee after exchange it fiat they get the same value whereas in Agate they exactly get what they sold and regardless of crypto price the value always stay the same.   3- unlike other app or coins they don't need to waiting from 10min to few hours to receive the fund as in Agate payments are instant . (1-3 Sec)  4- right now in different countries when merchant accepting fund they should pay between %1 to %8 to payment processor where in Agate is $0 (because user pay for transaction fee $0.00076)  5- integration for online websites is easy in 3min and over 80% of all ecommrece platform (Woocommerce, Magento, ,...) can accept via Agate by installing our free app/plugins (please refer to Github)  I hope I could answer your question but if you need to know more please refer to our WP as we mentioned many other reasons and example in there

Author: inv3stor
Title: ðŸ’° [ANN][ICO][AGT] ðŸ’° AGATE - Paypal for crypto currencies ðŸ’°
Body: Yes you are right that was the one of the hardest part which we resolved in Agate ICO,  when you transferring any of your crypto (currently 5 , Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ripple, Lite Coin, Ethereum ) to iBucket using either Agate Ai Engine which use the most advanced Artificial Intelligent and Machine learning algorithm or using Agate Trading Bot, or manually to iBucket and Agate blockchain will allocate iUSD token to  you, which you can use it anywhere in iFiat Ecosystem instant and almost free ( currently $0.00076 ) and if you want to transfer it to your Debit Card or Withraw it on your bank account in over 52 country you only need to pay %1 of transferred amount in Agate coin, this means if you buy and keep more Agate while the value of Agate keep increasing due to 10 different utilisation you always save alot of fee cost.   How transferring to card it's instant? By having a strong agreement with card issuer which as a result gave us a chance to have a trust account with them, as soon as user initiating the transfer, Agate using Card issuer API and instantly (30 sec)  transfer fund to card.like when you going to super market to get a gift card and they immediately transfer your desire amount to card.  why we can do and other similar app which only designed for Crypto-to-Card can't? Don't forget Agate is not running on some other blockchain (Ethereum, Bitcoin) which need alot of time and cost to transfer the fund, Agate transaction running on Agate blockchain protocol which has a block time of only 1SEC tx.  hope these answered your questions.
